 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּתבָּֿג‎</span>] (read always [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּתְבָּג‎</span>]) **noun [masculine]** ==portion== (of food) ==for king, delicacies== (Persian loanword, compare Sanskrit <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***prati-bhâga***</u></abbr>, Zend [<abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pati-baga***</u></abbr>; whence] Greek transliteration <span class="bdbLangGreek">ποτί‐βαζις</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Gildem<sup>ZKM iv. 213 f.</sup> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Ges. Abh.73</sup> [[BDB#Bev|Bev]]<sup>Dn</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Dn</sup>); — construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּתבַּֿג הַמֶּלֶךְ‎</span> [[Dan.1.5|Dan 1:5]]; [[Dan.1.8|Dan 1:8]]; [[Dan.1.13|Dan 1:13]]; [[Dan.1.15|Dan 1:15]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּתבָּֿגָם‎</span> v[[Dan.1.16|Dan 1:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹכְלֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַתבָּֿגוֺ‎</span> [[Dan.11.26|Dan 11:26]].
